TABLE.NAME: block_downloadlicensepdf
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains file_ids and the associated course_id, it will show all files with a license checked by a trainer.

FIELD.NAME: file_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This contains the file context id.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Contains the course number to check for which course the file license is checked.
